wordGroup: product category 产品类别；产品目录；积范畴
category management 品类管理；类别管理
semantic category 语义范畴；语义类别

sentences.en: His pictures don't fit into any category.
sentences.cn: 他的画哪一类也算不上。

sentences.en: The judges could not decide which category it belonged in.
sentences.cn: 法官们无法决定它属于哪一类别。

sentences.en: Out of over 400 staff there are just 7 that fall into this category.
sentences.cn: 400多个职员中只有7人属于这一类。
